ohloh.description: MeshBook is an open-source OSX utility app that uses OLSR (a routing protocol for mobile ad-hoc networks) for communication with mobile phones, computers, and other wireless devices to create decentralized mesh networks.
ohloh.name: commotion-meshbook

description: [Commotion Wireless](https://commotionwireless.net) is an open-source communication tool that uses mobile phones, computers, and other wireless devices to create decentralized mesh networks.
name: Commotion Wireless
